title: Bug 35012Setting the toolbar's background on RC2 doesn't work.
description: Bug 35012Setting the toolbar's background on RC2 doesn't work.
SR: In the attached zip I've added a changed version of the PDE's "Plugin with aview" project.I've changed the ToolBarTest.views.SampleView.createPartControl(Composite) method in order to "wrap" the table view in a ViewForm with atoolbar.I've also set the toolbar background to white (actually as you willsee I've set it to white twice).If you run the plugin in RC2 the background color of the toolbar button isgray.Running it on 2.02 and 2.03 the background of the toolbar button iswhite.
